portfolio.title: Dictionary
portfolio.description: A dictionary app that allows you to search for words and see their definitions. It is built with React and the Merriam-Webster dictionary API and Pexels Api .

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: A weather app that allows you to search for a city and see the current weather and the forecast for the next 5 days. It is built with React and the OpenWeather API.

portfolio.title: Password Generator
portfolio.description: A password generator that allows you to choose the length of the password and the type of characters you want to include. It is built with JavaScript.

portfolio.title: Fit-Club Gym
portfolio.description: This is a fit-club - gym webpage project done using create react app. It uses number counter library and framer-motion to give users an interactive experience while they explore the website.
